"A.D.2028/4/7/19:30": "Hah... hah... It's a one way victory, isn't it?"
"GOOD, Hitsugi-GIRL! <%me>! So far, the act has gone beyond my expectations!"
"Bethor!"
"Although, that just now was SO BAD! This can't be all, I've come to expect more from ACTORS like you!"
"You understand, Hitsugi-GIRL? It's something both you and <%me> lack!"
"I don't give a damn about your expectations! We came here kick your idiotic ass!"
"What?!"
"That's it Hitsugi-GIRL! That expression! That fresh face of someone who's fallen into despair! This is what I've always been waiting for, yo!"
"Although, <%me>. I don't like that expression of yours. It's indifferent."
"You guys also show the same expressions as us, don't you? PLEASE SHOW ME more and more of that raw expression, YOU SEE?!"
"He's creating those Phantoms through explosions? Your embodied weapon was supposed to be explosives, wasn't it?!"
"NO, NO, NO, NO, NO! What a huge MISTAKE, Hitsugi-GIRL!"
"My ability's called S.F.X! \"Sci-Fi effects\"! Not just explosions, but also illumination, impersonation, PHYSICAL EFFECTS! I can do anything!"
"It's techniques were mocked for being too outdated... However, with my power, it's been resurrected! The world's greatest filming technique!"
"Making FILMS more exciting! CRAZY! SENSATIONAL! That's my ROLE!"
"Hitsugi-GIRL! You should've have heard from Hagith, right ZE?"
"Ether isn't just for communication technology! It turns your dreams into reality! That's my way of using Ether, SA!"
"Enough of your jokes! Because of your petty reasons, you've gotten so many involved in your schemes! Who do you think you are, exactly?!"
"Hahaha! I'll have to throw your WORDS back at YOU, Hitsugi-GIRL! You, yourself, used to be a MEMBER of Mother Cluster, right?"
"You should've been told about this the day you joined Mother Cluster. We're the chosen ones. We're the ones who hold the power, NE!"
"By using that power, achieve your desires! Satisfy your needs! CHANGE THE WORLD! That's our ROLE!"
"You're wrong! That's definitely wrong!"
"This power doesn't exist to create a world that makes people sad, nor disappear!"
"I only thought of protecting Aru... And this child came to me... It's the power to protect."
"I've known that it's just a fairy tale - whether it's to protect everyone, or creating a peaceful world. Even so, I don't want to forget the efforts of getting close to that."
"I want to bring a world where everyone can smile, not having to lose anyone, closer."
"What you're doing is completely the opposite! It's neither greed, nor desires. Nothing more than your outrage of anger! Just destruction in disguise of production!"
"NO! That won't do, Hitsugi-GIRL. Doing something, thinking that you can't do it, is an illogical statement, don't you agree NE? "
"Turning fairy tales into reality is our power. It's the POWER of Ether. DO YOU UNDERSTAND?"
"With that negative viewpoint, you can't change the MIND, nor the WORLD, Hitsugi-GIRL!"
"Now, we're getting close to the end of the FILM. Let's move on to the CLIMAX, shall we?"
"<%me>, right to the very end, your expression never changed at all. You were unexpectedly a mediocre ACTOR."
"At least, show our audiences the raw expression of bitterness and pain in the LAST SCENE!"
"WHAT?! What happened? The film's rolling right now!"
"That means your filming was cancelled, useless director."
"Big brother... Enga!"
"Yo, you seem to be doing well, Hitsugi."
"YOU ARE! Enga... Yasaka!"
"Fufu, Enga-BOY. Didn't you disappear along with that room of yours?"
"There's no way I'd fall for something that obvious. At least have some pride in your tricks, right, Mr. Movie Director?"
"SHIT... But NO PROBLEM! If I eliminate all of you here, it's FINISHED! The ENDING ZE!"
"You're kidding, right? Nowadays, you can't get away with scripting like that."
"Reporting! The Phantoms within the area have been suppressed by friendly forces. All of them are disappearing!"
"Friendly forces? Not ARKS?"
"Yes, a force from Earth opposing Mother Cluster... supposedly called \"Earth Guide\"!"
"HOLY SHIT!! My scene! The STAGE I've worked to create!"
"Did you really think that I would come to an obvious trap without any preparations?"
"Although, it appears that there are idiots who actually rushed in without making any plans."
"Enga-BOY... Since you're not part of this cast, I expect you to leave immediately!"
"This stage... in my film... The film the world desires... Irregulars like you aren't needed! You have no place here!"
"Now now, you don't need to label me so cruelly. I'm actually pretty good at expressions and acting, you know."
"SHUT UP!!"
"I've heard all about you, <%me>."
"I know we just met and all but, can I rely on your power?"
"And, to my stupid little sister over there... What are you going to do? You can go and take a nap if you're tired."
"Don't say stupid things! I'll fight too!  "
"Well then, let's go and trash up this awful movie."
